name: Harder Better Faster Stronger
description:
A failed experiment has gone wrong and you are the only survivor in an underground lab full of mutants. Try to survive and kill all the mutants, and watch out for the radioactive gas as it may cause further mutations (even to you)!

Created for the Ludum Dare DISCORD JAM #5, our first attempt at a game jam.

Programming: shadowsora

Art: bluchu

Song: GLITCHUNTER - Portal To The Next Universe
